016package org.talend.sdk.component.api.record;
017
018import java.nio.charset.CharsetEncoder;
019import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
020import java.util.Base64;
021import java.util.Objects;
022import java.util.Optional;
023import java.util.function.BiConsumer;
024import java.util.function.Function;
025
026import org.talend.sdk.component.api.record.Schema.Entry;
027
028public class SchemaCompanionUtil {
029
030    /**
031     * Sanitize name to be avro compatible.
032     *
033     * @param name : original name.
034     *
035     * @return avro compatible name.
036     */
037    public static String sanitizeConnectionName(final String name) {
038        if (Schema.SKIP_SANITIZE || name == null || name.isEmpty()) {
039            return name;
040        }
041
042        char current = name.charAt(0);
043        final CharsetEncoder ascii = StandardCharsets.US_ASCII.newEncoder();
044        final boolean skipFirstChar = ((!ascii.canEncode(current)) || (!Character.isLetter(current) && current != '_'))
045                && name.length() > 1 && (!Character.isDigit(name.charAt(1)));
046
047        final StringBuilder sanitizedBuilder = new StringBuilder();
048
049        if (!skipFirstChar) {
050            if (((!Character.isLetter(current)) && current != '_') || (!ascii.canEncode(current))) {
051                sanitizedBuilder.append('_');
052            } else {
053                sanitizedBuilder.append(current);
054            }
055        }
056        for (int i = 1; i < name.length(); i++) {
057            current = name.charAt(i);
058            if (!ascii.canEncode(current)) {
059                if (Character.isLowerCase(current) || Character.isUpperCase(current)) {
060                    sanitizedBuilder.append('_');
061                } else {
062                    final byte[] encoded =
063                            Base64.getEncoder().encode(name.substring(i, i + 1).getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
064                    final String enc = new String(encoded);
065                    if (sanitizedBuilder.length() == 0 && Character.isDigit(enc.charAt(0))) {
066                        sanitizedBuilder.append('_');
067                    }
068                    for (int iter = 0; iter < enc.length(); iter++) {
069                        if (Character.isLetterOrDigit(enc.charAt(iter))) {
070                            sanitizedBuilder.append(enc.charAt(iter));
071                        } else {
072                            sanitizedBuilder.append('_');
073                        }
074                    }
075                }
076            } else if (Character.isLetterOrDigit(current)) {
077                sanitizedBuilder.append(current);
078            } else {
079                sanitizedBuilder.append('_');
080            }
081
082        }
083        return sanitizedBuilder.toString();
084    }
085
086    /**
087     * May return a different entry with different name.
088     */
089    public static Schema.Entry avoidCollision(final Schema.Entry newEntry,
090            final Function<String, Entry> entryGetter,
091            final BiConsumer<String, Entry> replaceFunction) {
092        if (Schema.SKIP_SANITIZE) {
093            return newEntry;
094        }
095
096        final Entry alreadyExistedEntry = findCollidedEntry(newEntry, entryGetter);
097        if (alreadyExistedEntry == null) {
098            // No collision, return new entry.
099            return newEntry;
100        }
101
102        final boolean matchedToChange = !isEmpty(alreadyExistedEntry.getRawName());
103        if (matchedToChange) {
104            // the rename has to be applied on entry already inside schema, so replace. (dunno why)
105            // replace existed entry with a new name
106            final String newSanitizedName = newNotCollidedName(entryGetter, alreadyExistedEntry.getRawName());
107            final Entry updatedExistedEntry = alreadyExistedEntry.toBuilder()
108                    .withName(newSanitizedName)
109                    .build();
110            replaceFunction.accept(alreadyExistedEntry.getName(), updatedExistedEntry);
111            return newEntry;
112        } else if (isEmpty(newEntry.getRawName())) {
113            // try to add exactly same raw, skip the add here.
114            return null;
115        } else {
116            // raw name isn't empty, so we need to create a new entry with a new name (sanitized).
117            final String newSanitizedName = newNotCollidedName(entryGetter, newEntry.getRawName());
118            return newEntry.toBuilder()
119                    .withName(newSanitizedName)
120                    .build();
121        }
122    }
123
124    private static Entry findCollidedEntry(final Entry newEntry, final Function<String, Entry> entryGetter) {
125        final Optional<Entry> collision = Optional.ofNullable(entryGetter.apply(newEntry.getName()))
126                .filter((final Entry fieldEntry) -> !Objects.equals(fieldEntry, newEntry));
127        return collision.orElse(null);
128    }
129
130    private static String newNotCollidedName(final Function<String, Entry> entryGetter, final String rawName) {
131        final String baseName = sanitizeConnectionName(rawName);
132        int indexForAnticollision = 1;
133        String newName = baseName + "_" + indexForAnticollision;
134        while (entryGetter.apply(newName) != null) {
135            indexForAnticollision++;
136            newName = baseName + "_" + indexForAnticollision;
137        }
138        return newName;
139    }
140
141    private static boolean isEmpty(final String value) {
142        return value == null || value.isEmpty();
143    }
144}
